item.title: Hosting a Hugo generated site on a remote server
item.description: Summary Use rsync to copy the /public folder generated by Hugo to public_html on your website server. The problem I had my Hugo site displaying nicely on my own PC. How do I upload it to the remote server that hosts my website? Unnecessary background I generated a website using Hugo to replace the site I built using Wordpress. I find it easier to generate content using Hugo. Each post is a simple text file with a folder where I put images.
